item.ds_aether_addon.relaxanttea.descrip: §7■ Cleanses all active effects and grants temporary suffocation immunity. A decoction of fruits and berries helps to calm down and collect one's thoughts.
item.ds_aether_addon.zephyr.description_: §7■ Grants temporary suffocation immunity. Everyone loves sweets! Aether dragons eat lots of honey, and if you mix it with honey, egg and water, you get a soft, airy treat.
item.ds_aether_addon.mistral.description: §7■ Cleanses poison and wither, grants absorption and regeneration. A favored combination of all things airy.
item.ds_aether_addon.stroganina.descript: §7■ Grants regeneration. Raw, thin, long-sliced frozen fish and raw meat, served on a kelp leaf. Popular amongst aether dragons.
item.ds_aether_addon.stuffedegg.descript: §7■ An egg stuffed with spices. Perfect for a quick snack.
item.ds_aether_addon.chopfordragon.descr: §7■ A classic combination of fish and raw meat, served on a bone. Traditional aether dragons' dish.
dragon_species.dragonsurvival.aether_dra:
§7■ §6Aether dragons§r§7 are §fquick§r§7, §fnimble§r§7 and elegant creatures, cutting through §fclouds and waves§r§7 with their bodies.

§2■ Features: §f§r§7high speed, weather and air magic, water breathing bonus, fall damage immunity.
§4■ Weakness: §r§7depth.
§6■ Diet: §f§r§7animal products.§r
dragon_ability.dragonsurvival.feather_fa: ■ Air magic that propels wind to blow around §fyou and your allies§r§7, applying §2slow fall§r§7 effect.
dragon_ability.dragonsurvival.weather_da:
■ Your dance causes §2rain clouds§r§7 to form and gather together.

■ The summoned §2thunder§r§7 will last for §f3 minutes§r§7.

■ §8Can not be used while it's raining or thundering.§r
■ Your serpentine body attracts the warm winds, allowing you to §2fly faster§r§7.

■ §2Speed§r§7 multiplier increases §fas you grow§r§7.
dragon_ability.dragonsurvival.typhoon.de:
■ With your paws, you expel §fa miniature typhoon§r§7 that §cdeals damage and explodes§r§7.

■ §cExplosion power§r§7 gets stronger §fas you grow§r§7.
■ Upgrading this ability increases your §2maximum mana pool§r§7 and allows to restore mana during §frain§r§7 or §fthunder§r§7.

■ §8The more levels you have, the more mana you get automatically.
dragon_ability.dragonsurvival.aether_win: ■ An aether dragon can control the air masses, allowing for §2fast flight§r§7 with the help of tailwinds. A dragon needs to §fgrow§r§7 to learn this ability.
dragon_ability.dragonsurvival.wide_lungs:
■  Aether dragons make up for the lack of gills with their lungs capacity. Over time they learn to §fhold their breath§r§7 for §2extended periods§r§7.

■ The more levels you have, the §2longer§r§7 you can stay §funderwater§r§7.
dragon_penalty.dragonsurvival.batophobia:
■ You are used to the fresh air, wind and the sky, and you can't stay long in §dthe deep§r. Upon descending into §ddepths§r, you start to panic and slowly §csuffocate§r§7. §cSuffocation§r§7 is also caused by campfire §dsmoke§r.

■ §2«Qi Concentration»§r§7 skill, chamomile tea and zephyr can alleviate the stress.
dragon_ability.dragonsurvival.qi_concent: ■ Allows you to §2stay longer§r§7 in §fdeep§r§7 areas.
dragon_ability.dragonsurvival.weathers_c:
■ Innate affinity with the winds increases your §2movement and flight speed§r§7 and §2attack speed§r§7 during §frain and thunderstorms§r§7.

■ §8The more levels you have, the higher the speed.§r
dragon_ability.dragonsurvival.aether_spi: ■ You can §2spin§r§7 through the §fair§r§7 and in §fwater§r§7, boosting your speed. Head to §fthe End§r §7to learn this skill.
dragon_ability.dragonsurvival.aether_imm: ■ The winds engulfing your body grant you §2fall damage immunity§r§7.
dragon_ability.dragonsurvival.aether_cla: ■ Aether dragons can not use claws to replace any tools or weapons. Instead, they receive a §2bonus§7 to §fattack and block breaking speed§r§7. This ability gets stronger §fas you grow§r§7.
dragon_ability.dragonsurvival.levitation:
■ Create an updraft beneath the enemy’s feet, §cknocking the target into the air§r§7. When the airflow dissipates, the §fvictim§r§7 falls and suffers §7§fpercentage true damage§r§7 based on their §cmaximum health§r§7.

■ The effect level of §aSkyfall Impact§r§7 represents how much percentage damage is dealt. 

■ §cRange§r§7 and §cpercentage damage§r§7 increase with the §fexperience level§r§7.
dragon_ability.dragonsurvival.behuman.de:
■ When the Aether Dragon reaches the Ancient stage, it can transform into a human form.

■ §cNote: The current version has model issues, third-person view is recommended!§r
dragon_ability.dragonsurvival.wind_breat:
■ The Aether Dragon exhales a gentle breeze, as if breathing clouds and mist.

■ The wind can §2clear weeds§7 and also §2grant speed§7 to allies.§r

■ Its §2damage is low§7, but it §2does not consume mana§7.§r
dragon_species.dragonsurvival.aether_dra:
§7■ The §6Aether Dragon§r§7 is a §fswift§r§7, §fagile§r§7, and graceful creature, its body cutting through §fseas of clouds and waves§r§7.

§2■ Traits:§f§r§7 High mobility, weather and airflow magic, underwater breathing boost, fall immunity.
§4■ Weakness:§r§7 Deep underground.
§6■ Diet:§f§r§7 Animal products.§r

§7■ The §6Qing Dragon§r§7 is the human form after the Aether Dragon transforms.§r§7

§2■ Traits:§f§r§7 High mobility, weather and airflow magic, underwater breathing boost, fall immunity.
§4■ Weakness:§r§7 Deep underground.
§6■ Diet:§f§r§7 Animal products.§r
dragon_body.dragonsurvival.aether_body.d:
§6■ Serpentine body§r
§7■ Aether dragons are the true air benders: the streamlined body allows for greater speed on land, water and mid-air. They §fuse less hunger§r§7 during flight, §frun faster§r§7 and §fjump higher§r§7. In turn, aether dragons are more vulnerable in combat, lacking in physical strength, health and protection.
dragon_body.dragonsurvival.aether_body_h:
§6■ Human body§r
§7■ Qing dragons are the true air benders: the streamlined body allows for greater speed on land, water and mid-air. They §fuse less hunger§r§7 during flight, §frun faster§r§7 and §fjump higher§r§7. In turn, aether dragons are more vulnerable in combat, lacking in physical strength, health and protection.
